author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: The equivalent of a robot from the well-known brand TM, only cheaper. For me it's amazing. Cuts, mixes, cooks, kneads dough, steams. In one word, amazing! Perfect even for people who don't know how to cook. Thanks to built-in recipes, it guides you step by step through the subsequent stages of cooking. Easy to clean. I recommend.

author: Artur
content: Great, I recommend it, it is no worse than a model from a well-known company for PLN 6,000.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: The robot works great in the kitchen. Nevertheless, I disagree with the opinion that you don't need to know how to cook. I tried a lot of recipes from the mc database. Most dishes are barren in taste because there are few spices in the recipes. Some recipes require a lot of intervention to make them tasty. New regulations are being implemented very slowly. There are many more recipes on the Internet on the mc website than those programmed on the device - much needs improvement.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I was waiting for the price to be lower, and then it increased by PLN 300...

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I am very pleased with MC, I have been using it since August, it makes preparing meals very easy

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content:
Not long ago you could buy it for PLN 1,400 and now for PLN 1,900. I might buy it for PLN 1,000...
For half the price you can buy Biedromix with a much better mobile application.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content:
We were very disappointed with this device in terms of functionality. The essence of the device is access to recipes and ease of their implementation. Unfortunately, the phone app is a complete disaster... a non-intuitive, jamming mess that pretends to be an app. Saving recipes, adding shopping lists and searching do not work. There are only a few recipes loaded on the device and others do not load despite being connected to the Internet. I finally managed to add a recipe to my favorites on the recipe website, but it did not appear on the device. This is its biggest disadvantage. Technically, the device's touch display works at the speed of a turtle, it is probably taken from the first touch phones where you had to use a hammer to press something. 4 hours after receiving the shipment with the robot, we decided to return it.
If you are interested in entering recipes manually and having a terrible connection to the application (or rather no connection), I recommend this purchase!

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Lipa... stopped working after 3 months, and was not used that often...

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: There is no comparison to the TM6, it's like the Seicento and the Mercedes, both of them drive.... the regulations have not been checked, the lack of care from a representative, which is very important, the bowl without a proper handle, and the quality of workmanship and aesthetic appearance.
